Summary: went really fast. then slowed down, then dissapeard.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was thundering, so my husband and I went outside to get our dogs. I seen a big glowing yellow ball flying through sky, thought a plane at first. But it was so big and wasnt blinking or making sound . I kept watching as it flew so fast. I told my husband to look. He said what is that? I said idk its not a star or airplane. Got my dogs and was heading inside and I seen it above a house hovering pulsating in color. Then was gone.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Willow Springs
There were no other sightings in Willow Springs on or around June 22nd 2013
